title: Confl&Secur in DevCountr
description: Introduces research on the causes and consequences of contemporary armed conflict as well as economic studies of terrorism.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECON 2106 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 2100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 2105 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 2101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
